article.Heading: GST return filings concerns: What's holding back return filings?
article.Summary: Only 32 lakh businesses have actually filed their returns from the 68 lakh goods and services tax (GST) code owners. A huge mismatch for the government. CNBC-TV18 tried finding out what is holding back. Uttkarsh Chaturvedi spoke to a few construction material makers and stumbled upon issues like complex GST structures and an unfriendly GSTN system.
article.Body:
Only 32 lakh businesses have actually filed their returns from the 68 lakh goods and services tax (GST) code owners. A huge mismatch for the government. CNBC-TV18 tried finding out what is holding back. Uttkarsh Chaturvedi spoke to a few construction material makers and stumbled upon issues like complex GST structures and an unfriendly GSTN system.

Watch accompanying video for more details.
